text: kya in (mushrikon) ke kuchh aise saajhee[1] hain, jinhonne unake lie koee aisa dhaarmik niyam bana diya hai, jisakee anumati allaah ne nahin dee hai? aur yadi nirnay kee baat nishchit na hotee, to (abhee) inake beech nirnay kar diya jaata tatha nishchay atyaachaariyon ke lie hee duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
